description: Create your own shade wherever your travels take you. This sun hat's wide brim provides plenty of protection with a bit of elegance. The poly-straw weave can be flattened and packed again and again without wrinkling, making it ideal for beach vacations or summer travel.11.5cm brim shields you from the sun.Lightweight poly-straw weave packs down for easy travel.Inner drawstring lets you adjust the fit.
name: Wallaroo Victoria Diva Hat - Women's
